original_text: So Gideon took ten men of his servants and did as the Lord had told him. But because he was too afraid of his family and the men of the town to do it by day, he did it by night.
korean_text: 이에 기드온이 종 열 사람을 데리고 여호와께서 그에게 말씀하신 대로 행하되 그의 아버지의 가문과 그 성읍 사람들을 두려워하므로 이 일을 감히 낮에 행하지 못하고 밤에 행하니라

sentences.original_text: So Gideon took ten men of his servants
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 기드온은 그의 종 열 명을 데리고

sentences.original_text: and did as the Lord had told him.
But he was too afraid of his family
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그는 자기 가족 때문에 너무 두려워서

sentences.original_text: and the men of the town
